name: Ekeko
description:
The Ekeko is the Tiwanakan (pre Columbian civilization) god of abundance and prosperity in the mythology and folklore of the people from the Peruvian and Bolivian Altiplano. The Ekeko is a mythical entity of good prosper, that brings monetary wealth to its worshippers. An offering is generally required before he provides his services. Banknotes are often clipped to the Ekeko as offerings, but some statuettes allow for a cigarette to be lit as an offering. The Ekeko is now part of the metaverse

This painting was part of the "Sembrando frijoles" exhibition at the Frijol Mágico illustration festival in La Serena, Chile, and now it can be yours.
